description: * Based on the Osomatsu-kun gag manga series by http://anidb.net/cr977 [Akatsuka Fujio].

REGULAR.description:
The TV anime, “Mr. Osomatsu,” that wrapped up in 2016 is coming back! Just what did Iyami and Chibita witness after the ending of the very turbulent first season? Have the sextuplets learned their lesson from last time? Are they willing to do things properly now?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukkatsu Osomatsu-san
Mr. Osomatsu Returns
ふっかつ おそ松さん

REGULAR.description:
The sextuplets are still NEETs and their parents have had just about enough, and Iyami gets a stain on his suit on the way to a party. Professor Dekapan gives him a powerful detergent and it works miracles... But the sextuplets get their hands on it and mistake it for alcohol...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Congratulations! Employment!! / Super Detergent
Iwai: Shuushoku!! / Chou Senzai
祝・就職!! / 超洗剤

REGULAR.description:
What could be more obnoxious than one Steve? How about two? Steve discovers he`s had a shadowy body double all along, who now wants to be something more! Meanwhile, a sinister conspirator discovers the persuasive power of a turn of phrase, and Pascal composes a verse to help a student in need.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cavematsu-san / Choromatsu and Ichimatsu / Totoko`s Challenge
